metadata.synopsis: A noted psychologist (Efrem Zimbalist Jr.) surveys the sex lives of four Los Angeles women, from one extreme (Jane Fonda) to the other (Claire Bloom).

reviews: Cukor's trashy melodrama about the sex lives of L.A. housewives suffered due to censorship, but it's worth seeing for Claire Bloom's performance as a nymphomaniac; Shelley Winters and Jane Fonda co-star
